import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import NavigationBar from '../NavigationBar/NavigationBar' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import './Register.css' const Register = () => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = (e) => { setNewUser({ ...newUser, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // Handle form submission } return (
Username Email Password
Already have an account? Login
) } export default Register
